name: eval_find_ca_high_risk
description: Evaluating quantity of high risk CA combination cases in BDD dataset)
author: AIST

inventories.name: Data
inventories.description: Classification of different attributes related to autonomous driving scenarios

inventories.name: High_risk_CA_combinations
inventories.description: Combinations of different attribute values that are high risk situations in real life

measures.name: SingleCount
measures.description: Number of high risk cases in simple combinations

measures.name: CombinedCount
measures.description: Number of high risk cases in combine combinations

resources.name: CountResult
resources.description: Count of number of data in each high risk case

resources.name: CombinedCountResult
resources.description: Count of number of data in various high risk case combinations

resources.name: DistributionPlot
resources.description: Plot of percentage of various high risk cases in data
